1.content: Research current USD to Naira exchange rate for accurate pricing
1.details: Convert 2500 NGN to USD equivalent for Stripe subscription pricing

2.details: 1. Initialize Stripe subscription template in Supabase. 2. Create subscription tables (subscriptions, payments, plans). 3. Deploy Stripe payment Edge Functions
